newsitem.title: USA: Fed begins meeting to discuss interest rate policy.
newsitem.headline: Fed begins meeting to discuss interest rate policy.

text.p: The Federal Reserve's Federal Open Market Committee began meeting Tuesday at 0900 EDT (1300 GMT) to discuss interest rate policy.
Most economists think the economy has shown enough signs of slowing from its brisk second quarter pace for the Fed to keep rates steady.
Any decision is likely to be announced around 1415 EDT (1815 GMT), if the Fed follows past practice.
